config.undertale_healthbars.title: Undertale HealthBars Configuration
config.undertale_healthbars.option.showH:
Shows/Hides HealthBars depending on this option.
Damage/Heal numbers can be hidden from below options
config.undertale_healthbars.option.modEn:
Enable or Disable the whole mod.
This includes:
- Healthbars
- Damage/Heal Numbers
- Damage/Heal Sounds
- Undertale Bossbars
- Bossbar Damage/Heal Numbers

You can also toggle this setting from the keybind "Toggle Mod"
config.undertale_healthbars.option.alway:
If no, only will show healthbar when an entity is damaged or healed.
Doesn't work when above option is false
config.undertale_healthbars.option.showH: If "Always Show HealthBars" is disabled, Shows the healthbar for a second when the entity gets damaged.
If "Always Show HealthBars" is disabled, Shows the healthbar for a second when the entity heals.
config.undertale_healthbars.option.showD: If enabled, Entities will show a Undertale Styled Damage Number above their Healthbar when its damaged
config.undertale_healthbars.option.showH: If enabled, Entities will show a Undertale Styled Heal Number above their Healthbar when it heals
config.undertale_healthbars.option.healt: Move the healthbar and damage/heal number up or down from its default y position in blocks
config.undertale_healthbars.option.rende: Weather to show the healthbar and damage numbers on your own player in F5 mode
config.undertale_healthbars.option.damag:
Volume of Undertale damage sound.
Set it to 0 to turn off
config.undertale_healthbars.option.healS:
Volume of Undertale heal sound.
Set it to 0 to turn off
config.undertale_healthbars.option.damag: Play Undertale Damage Sound for Yourself
Enable this to play Undertale damage sound when you get damaged
config.undertale_healthbars.option.healS: Play Undertale Healing Sound for Yourself
Enable this to play Undertale heal sound when you heal
config.undertale_healthbars.option.showU: Replace normal BossBars with Undertale styled BossBars for Ender Dragon and Wither
Shows damage the boss gets to the right of the BossBar
Shows heals the boss gets to the right of the BossBar
